DOC.brief_summary: Questionnaire study to observe the incidence and pattern or nausea and vomiting in patients receiving combined chemotherapy and radiation. 83% of patients experience radiation therapy-induced vomiting; significant nausea and vomiting could develop with concurrent chemotherapy despite standard anti-nauseous medication prophylaxis.
DOC.brief_title: Incidence and Patterns of Nausea/Vomiting With Combined Chemotherapy and Radiation
DOC.detailed_description: Questionnaires will be answered daily on a weekly basis during period of radiation and chemotherapy.
DOC.criteria: Concurrent radiation and chemotherapy treatment Aerodigestive malignancy Other causes of vomiting (i.e.gastrointestinal obstruction...)
